requirements.summary: Deploy the GoCode Zone application to production on the Internet Computer mainnet
acceptanceCriteria: Application is deployed and accessible via a production URL on the Internet Computer
All existing features (Home, About, Course, Join Discord, VIP, Privacy Policy, Contact pages) are functional in production
Contact form submissions persist to the backend canister
Discord invite links work correctly in production
Navigation and routing function properly across all pages

file_operations.description: Verify the backend canister connection configuration uses production canister IDs and mainnet host URLs. Ensure the actor initialization properly connects to the deployed mainnet backend canister.
Verify React Query and Internet Identity provider configurations are suitable for production deployment. Ensure no development-only configurations remain.
Verify the HTML entry point contains appropriate meta tags and configuration for production deployment on the Internet Computer.
Verify all seven routes (Home, About, Course, Join, VIP, Privacy, Contact) are properly configured and will function correctly in the production environment with proper navigation and routing.
Verify the contact form submission through useSubmitContact hook will correctly persist data to the production backend canister. Ensure error handling and success notifications work in production.
Verify the Discord invite link (https://discord.gg/y5EBSaf8r2) is correctly maintained and will work in production.
Verify the Discord invite button and community joining instructions reference the correct Discord server link and will function properly in production.
Verify the contact email address (gocodezone@googlegroups.com) is correctly maintained and alternative communication methods are accessible in production.
Verify React Query hooks for contact submission and fetching contacts work correctly with the production backend actor and handle production network conditions appropriately.
